column4: Which packages do are the the OpenGL Python bindings and the GtkGLExt Python bindings
does typing  apt-cache search opengl python  not do the trick?
your advice works for opengl bindings but what package is the GtkGLExt Python bindings?
i can't find it, to be honest. but http://www.k-3d.org/gtkglext/Main_Page says there's an Ubuntu package available from third parties
